## Classes

### sal2

Install and configure the LSST Service Abstraction Layer (SAL)

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include sal2
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `sal2` class.

##### `exec_path`

Data type: `Array`

Set path for execs.
Use for allowing custom 'python' and 'pip' to be found.

##### `install_path`

Data type: `String`

Directory under which everything will be installed.

##### `required_os_pkgs`

Data type: `Array`

Other OS packages this module depends on

### sal2::dds

Install opensplice dds

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include sal2::dds
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `sal2::dds` class.

##### `ospl_package_name`

Data type: `String`

Package name according to yum

### sal2::idl

A description of what this class does

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include sal2::idl
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `sal2::idl` class.

##### `rpm_idl_dir`

Data type: `Stdlib::Absolutepath`

Where the rpms installed the idl files (so they can be copied into the
git clone target.)

##### `git_repo_url`

Data type: `String`



##### `version`

Data type: `String`

### sal2::rpm

Install SAL rpm repo and packages

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet

```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `sal2::rpm` class.

##### `packages`

Data type: `Array`



##### `ts_sal_version`

Data type: `String`



##### `ts_xml_version`

Data type: `String`

Data type: `Hash`
